alert.note: Alert for Manistee; Wexford (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 25 at 4:53PM EDT until June 25 at 5:45PM EDT by NWS Gaylord
info.description: The National Weather Service in Gaylord has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Wexford County in northern Michigan... Manistee County in northern Michigan... * Until 545 PM EDT. * At 452 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles southwest of Manistee to near Free Soil to Baldwin, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Manistee, Thompsonville, Arcadia, Sherman, Buckley, Boon, Eastlake, Kaleva, Onekama, Mesick, Bear Lake, Copemish, Harrietta, Meauwataka, Dublin, Brethren, Orchard Beach State Park, Wellston, Pierport and Hoxeyville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
